name: The Tower (itch) (BlueJayBird)
description:
This was made for the My First Game Jam: Summer 2019

This is just a small platformer game I made in Unreal, but mainly in the dark. It is also not that good just gonna say that now.

I wasn't able to work as much on this as I wanted to, but I still learned a lot from it. I never got to add audio and don't have the time now.

Requires: Windows

That's all I know
